channel.title: +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Animal products
item.description: Source: MT20 Bovine excreta There is nothing strange about the consumption of bovine excreta and fecal matter. It is a common adaptation seen across pastoralists of different origins. We know our Indo-European strand of ancestry on the steppes did so; African cattle-breeding tribes do so; it will not be surprising if the Harappans & south Indian Ash mound tribes did something like that given that they were cattle rearers too.
